AppFooter.tagline: Connecting the agricultural value chain for a sustainable future.

hero.title: Cultivating Connections, Harvesting Prosperity
hero.subtitle: We're on a mission to digitize and connect the global agricultural supply chain, empowering every stakeholder from soil to shelf.

vision.title: Our Vision for a Connected Future
vision.p1: DamDoh was born from a simple but powerful idea: that technology can bridge the gaps in the agricultural world. We envision a world where smallholder farmers have direct access to global markets, where buyers can source produce with verifiable confidence, and where knowledge flows freely to create a more sustainable and equitable food system.
vision.p2: We are more than just a platform; we are a community dedicated to solving real-world challenges with innovative, user-centric solutions.

challenge.title: The Fragmented Landscape of Agriculture
challenge.description: The agricultural supply chain is a complex and often disconnected ecosystem, presenting numerous challenges for everyone involved.
details: Smallholders struggle to connect with larger, more profitable markets.
Poor coordination leads to high costs and significant post-harvest losses.
Lack of formal records prevents access to credit, loans, and insurance.
Farmers lack access to modern techniques and real-time market data.
Buyers face uncertainty about produce quality, origin, and farming practices.
Increasing unpredictability requires more resilient farming systems.
A significant portion of food is lost between the farm and the consumer.
Siloed information prevents a holistic view of the supply chain.

solution.title: The DamDoh Solution: An Integrated Ecosystem
solution.description: We address these challenges by providing a single, unified platform with tools for everyone.

p2p.title: Peer-to-Peer
p2p.content: Farmers connecting with other farmers to share knowledge and form cooperatives.

p2b.title: Producer-to-Business
p2b.content: Direct links between farmers and buyers, processors, and exporters, cutting out unnecessary middlemen.

p2e.title: Producer-to-Expert
p2e.content: Access to agronomists, financial advisors, and logistics providers to improve operations.

p2w.title: Producer-to-World
p2w.content: Enabling smallholder farmers to participate in the global marketplace with confidence and transparency.

commitment.title: Join Our Growing Ecosystem
commitment.p1: Our commitment is to the people who feed the world. We believe that by providing the digital tools they need, we can foster a more resilient, profitable, and sustainable agricultural sector for generations to come.
commitment.p2: Whether you are planting a seed, buying in bulk, or financing a farm, you have a place in the DamDoh community.

careersPage.title: Careers at DamDoh
careersPage.subtitle: Join a passionate team dedicated to revolutionizing the global agricultural supply chain.

whyWorkWithUs.title: Why Work With Us?
whyWorkWithUs.intro: At DamDoh, we're not just building a product; we're building a movement. We believe in the power of technology to create a more equitable and sustainable food system. Join us to:
whyWorkWithUs.point1: Work on challenging problems with real-world impact.
whyWorkWithUs.point2: Collaborate with a diverse, talented, and mission-driven team.
whyWorkWithUs.point3: Enjoy a culture of learning, growth, and innovation.
whyWorkWithUs.point4: Shape the future of agriculture on a global scale.
whyWorkWithUs.point5: Benefit from a flexible and supportive work environment.

noOpenings.title: No Openings at the Moment
noOpenings.content1: We are always looking for passionate and talented individuals. If you believe in our mission and think you can contribute, we'd love to hear from you. Please send your resume and a cover letter to

job1.title: Senior Frontend Engineer (Next.js)
job1.description: We are looking for an experienced frontend engineer to lead the development of our user-facing web and mobile applications using Next.js and TypeScript.

job2.title: AI/ML Engineer - Agricultural Insights
job2.description: Develop and deploy machine learning models for crop diagnostics, market price prediction, and personalized user recommendations.

job3.title: Regional Partnerships Manager - East Africa
job3.description: Build and manage strategic partnerships with cooperatives, financial institutions, and logistics providers across East Africa.

communityGuidelines.title: Community Guidelines
communityGuidelines.subtitle: Our commitment to a safe, respectful, and professional environment.
communityGuidelines.intro: Welcome to the DamDoh community! Our mission is to connect the global agricultural supply chain. To ensure this is a productive and trusted space for everyone, we ask that you follow these guidelines.

respectful.title: Be Respectful and Constructive
respectful.description: Treat all members with respect, even when you disagree. Healthy debate is encouraged, but personal attacks, harassment, hate speech, or bullying will not be tolerated.

authentic.title: Be Authentic and Honest
authentic.description: Represent yourself and your business truthfully. Do not impersonate others or provide misleading information about your products, services, or credentials.

relevant.title: Stay On-Topic and Add Value
relevant.description: Keep your posts and comments relevant to the forum or discussion topic. Share valuable insights, ask thoughtful questions, and avoid spamming or excessive self-promotion.

fairTrade.title: Practice Fair Trade
fairTrade.description: Conduct all business on the marketplace with integrity. Fulfill your orders, pay agreed-upon prices, and communicate clearly and professionally.

sustainable.title: Promote Sustainability
sustainable.description: While not a requirement for all, we encourage discussions and practices that promote environmental stewardship, soil health, and long-term sustainability.

reporting.title: Reporting Violations
reporting.content: If you see content that violates these guidelines, please report it to our moderation team. You can flag posts or contact us directly at {emailLink}.

communityGuidelines.conclusion: By using DamDoh, you agree to these guidelines. We reserve the right to remove content and suspend accounts that violate these principles. Thank you for helping us build a positive and professional community.

contactPage.title: Contact Us
contactPage.subtitle: We're here to help. Reach out to us through any of the channels below.

sendMessage.title: Send us a Message
sendMessage.note: We'll do our best to respond within 24 business hours.

news1.title: Global Coffee Prices Surge Amid Supply Chain Disruptions
news1.excerpt: A combination of adverse weather in key growing regions and ongoing logistical challenges has pushed coffee futures to a two-year high...

news2.title: EU Implements New Sustainable Packaging Regulations for Food Imports
news2.excerpt: New regulations taking effect next quarter will require all food imports to meet stricter criteria for recyclable and compostable packaging...

news3.title: Study Shows Regenerative Farming Practices Increase Soil Carbon by up to 25%
news3.excerpt: A decade-long study reveals that no-till farming and cover cropping can significantly enhance soil carbon sequestration, offering a key tool in climate change mitigation...

privacy.title: Privacy & Visibility
privacy.description: Control who can see your profile and activity.
privacy.profileVisibilityDescription: Who can see your full profile?
privacy.connectionRequestsLabel: Who can send you connection requests?
privacy.connectionRequestsDescription: Limit who can initiate a new connection with you.
privacy.contactInfoVisibilityLabel: Who can see your contact info?
privacy.contactInfoVisibilityDescription: Control visibility for your email and phone number.
privacy.activityStatusDescription: Let others know when you are active on DamDoh.
privacy.searchIndexingDescription: Allow your profile to appear in external search engines.
privacy.dataConsentDescription: To provide a seamless experience, DamDoh can use your data across different modules. You control how your data is shared.
privacy.marketplaceHistoryLabel: Share Marketplace History with Financial Institutions
privacy.marketplaceHistoryDescription: Allow trusted FIs to view your transaction history when you apply for a loan or grant, potentially leading to better offers.
privacy.traceabilityDataDescription: Allow anyone with a VTI to view its full public traceability report, increasing transparency and trust.
privacy.financialApplicationDataLabel: Use Application Data for AI Matching
privacy.financialApplicationDataDescription: Allow our AI to analyze your anonymized application data to better match you with suitable financial products.

appearance.title: Appearance

appearance.themeDescription: Choose a light or dark theme for your interface.
